page.title: 06My hobby by John Garland
page.content: I collect football programmes.They are the programmes that you get at football matches and they tell you the team and all about them.You get good programmes in the First Division and not so good in the Second Division.They cost in the range of 30pence to 50pence but Cup game programmes are about Â£1 or Â£2.Football programmes are like little books.I first started because my Grandma was going to throw away some old Leicester City programmes( they are a local football team) and so I had them off her.I've collected them ever since.I am in a programme club where you send 25p and you get three programmes free and a catalogue that you can buy more programmes from.
